result.repo_summary_line: A microservices ecosystem for the Ronin Wallet, providing services for quest management, reward distribution, and device handling.

monorepo_services.name: Antenna
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the Antenna service in the application, including configuration, routing, and dependency injection.

monorepo_services.name: CMS
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the CMS application.

monorepo_services.name: Consumer
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for initializing and managing the consumer service in a wallet application.

monorepo_services.name: Cron Job
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing and executing scheduled tasks within the application.

monorepo_services.name: Device Manager
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing devices within the application.

monorepo_services.name: Discovery
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the discovery service.

monorepo_services.name: Proxy
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing the proxy service in the Ronin wallet application.

monorepo_services.name: Push Notification
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing push notification services within the application.

monorepo_services.name: Quest Center
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for the quest center service in the Ronin wallet application.

monorepo_services.name: Task Scheduler
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing and executing scheduled tasks within an application.

monorepo_services.name: Task Server
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing the task server application.

monorepo_services.name: Wallet Manager
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Responsible for managing wallet operations and providing API endpoints.
